verses.verse: O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, how long shall I <S%H7768>cry<s%>, and thou wilt not <S%H8085>hear<s%>! even cry <S%H2199>out<s%> unto thee of <S%H2555>violence<s%>, and thou wilt not <S%H3467>save<s%>!

Why dost thou <S%H7200>shew<s%> me <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, and cause me to <S%H5027>behold<s%> <S%H5999>grievance<s%>? for <S%H7701>spoiling<s%> and <S%H2555>violence<s%> are before me: and there are that raise <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H7379>strife<s%> and <S%H4066>contention<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H6313>slacked<s%>, and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> doth <S%H5331>never<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%>: for the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> doth <S%H3803>compass<s%> about the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; therefore <S%H6127>wrong<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H3318>proceedeth<s%>. wrong: or, wrested

<S%H7200>Behold<s%> ye among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and <S%H5027>regard<s%>, and <S%H8539>wonder<s%> <S%H8539>marvellously<s%>: for I will <S%H6466>work<s%> a <S%H6467>work<s%> in your <S%H3117>days<s%>, which ye will not <S%H539>believe<s%>, though it be <S%H5608>told<s%> you.

For, lo, I raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, that <S%H4751>bitter<s%> and <S%H4116>hasty<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, which shall <S%H1980>march<s%> through the <S%H4800>breadth<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H4908>dwellingplaces<s%> that are not theirs. breadth: Heb. breadths

They are <S%H366>terrible<s%> and <S%H3372>dreadful<s%>: their <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and their <S%H7613>dignity<s%> shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> of themselves. their judgment: or, from them shall proceed the judgment of these, and the captivity of these

Their <S%H5483>horses<s%> also are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than the <S%H5246>leopards<s%>, and are more <S%H2300>fierce<s%> than the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H2061>wolves<s%>: and their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> shall <S%H6335>spread<s%> themselves, and their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>far<s%>; they shall <S%H5774>fly<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> that <S%H2363>hasteth<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>. fierce: Heb. sharp

They shall <S%H935>come<s%> all for <S%H2555>violence<s%>: their <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall sup <S%H4041>up<s%> as the east <S%H6921>wind<s%>, and they shall <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%>. their: or, the supping up of their faces, etc: or, their faces shall look (Heb. the opposition of their faces) toward the east

And they shall <S%H7046>scoff<s%> at the <S%H4428>kings<s%>, and the <S%H7336>princes<s%> shall be a <S%H4890>scorn<s%> unto them: they shall <S%H7832>deride<s%> every strong <S%H4013>hold<s%>; for they shall <S%H6651>heap<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%>, and <S%H3920>take<s%> it.
Then shall his <S%H7307>mind<s%> <S%H2498>change<s%>, and he shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%>, and <S%H816>offend<s%>, imputing <S%H2098>this<s%> his <S%H3581>power<s%> unto his <S%H433>god<s%>.

Art thou not from <S%H6924>everlasting<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, mine Holy <S%H6918>One<s%>? we shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>. O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou hast <S%H7760>ordained<s%> them for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; and, O mighty <S%H6697>God<s%>, thou hast <S%H3245>established<s%> them for <S%H3198>correction<s%>. mighty: Heb. rock. established: Heb. founded

Thou art of <S%H2889>purer<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> than to <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H3201>canst<s%> not <S%H5027>look<s%> on <S%H5999>iniquity<s%>: wherefore <S%H5027>lookest<s%> thou upon them that deal <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and holdest thy <S%H2790>tongue<s%> when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>devoureth<s%> the man that is more <S%H6662>righteous<s%> than he? iniquity: or, grievance
And <S%H6213>makest<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> as the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, as the creeping <S%H7431>things<s%>, that have no <S%H4910>ruler<s%> over them? creeping: or, moving

They take <S%H5927>up<s%> all of them with the <S%H2443>angle<s%>, they <S%H1641>catch<s%> them in their <S%H2764>net<s%>, and <S%H622>gather<s%> them in their <S%H4365>drag<s%>: therefore they <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> and are <S%H1523>glad<s%>. drag: or, flue net

Therefore they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto their <S%H2764>net<s%>, and burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto their <S%H4365>drag<s%>; because by <S%H1992>them<s%> their <S%H2506>portion<s%> is <S%H8082>fat<s%>, and their <S%H3978>meat<s%> <S%H1277>plenteous<s%>. plenteous: or, dainty: Heb. fat
Shall they therefore <S%H7324>empty<s%> their <S%H2764>net<s%>, and not <S%H2550>spare<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>?
